Package de.dfki.lt.mary.unitselection

Interface Summary
JoinCostFunction A join cost function for evaluating the goodness-of-fit of a given pair of left and right unit.
TargetCostFunction A target cost function for evaluating the goodness-of-fit of a given unit for a given target.
UnitConcatenator Concatenates the units of an utterance and returns an audio stream

MCepDatagram

PrecompiledJoinCostReader Loads a precompiled join cost file and provides access to the join cost.
SelectedUnit A unit selected from Viterbi
Target A representation of a target representing the ideal properties of a unit in a target utterance.
TimelineReader The TimelineReader class provides an interface to read regularly or variably spaced datagrams from a Timeline data file in Mary format.
Unit Representation of a unit from a unit database.
UnitDatabase The unit database of a voice
UnitFileReader Loads a unit file in memory and provides accessors to the start times and durations.
UnitSelectionSynthesizer Builds and synthesizes unit selection voices
UnitSelectionVoice A Unit Selection Voice
UnitSelectionVoiceBuilder Builds the arctic voices replaces ArcticVoiceDirectory, together with the .config files for the voices
UnitSelector Selects the units for an utterance
